oai:envidat.ch:833ab441-a144-4aad-98e0-17cd49353232;2018-12-09T00:33:43Z;10.21258/1057112;Abegg, M.;WSL;Brändli, U.-B.;WSL;Cioldi, F.;WSL;Fischer, C.;WSL;Herold-Bonardi, A.;WSL;Huber M.;WSL;Keller, M.;WSL;Meile, R.;WSL;Rösler, E.;WSL;Speich, S.;WSL;Traub, B.;WSL;Vidondo, B.;WSL;Yield and mortality*;2014;Swiss Federal Research Institute WSL;14 X 14 KM GRID;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI1-NFI2;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI1-NFI2-NFI3-NFI4;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI2-NFI3;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI2-NFI3-NFI4;ACCESSIBLE FOREST WITHOUT SHRUB FOREST NFI3-NFI4;ALTITUDE 400 M CLASSES;ALTITUDINAL VEGETATION ZONE;CANTON;CONIFERS-BROADLEAVES;FOREST DISTRICT AS OF 2013;GRID NFI4 2009-2013;INCREMENT STAR;LOWER-HIGHER ALTITUDINAL ZONES;MAIN TREE SPECIES;NFI1-NFI2;NFI2-NFI3;NFI3-NFI4B;OWNERSHIP;YIELD AND MORTALITY STAR;Urs-Beat Brändli;WSL;2018-12-06;en;Dataset;https://www.envidat.ch/dataset/yield_and_mortality_star-163;URL;1.0;Other (Open);Volume of stemwood with bark of all trees and shrubs  starting at 12 cm dbh that were used, died or disappeared between two inventories.  *In the calculation no D7/tree height data were used. The values calculated like this have not been corrected for bias, but allow for cantons or forest districts a more robust estimation of changes and could thus be better interpreted.

 > _Abegg, M.; Brändli, U.-B.; Cioldi, F.; Fischer, C.; Herold-Bonardi, A.; Huber M.; Keller, M.; Meile, R.; Rösler, E.; Speich, S.; Traub, B.; Vidondo, B. (2014). name: 4f6a91ff-f44a-5550-9968-0c3bc0c88240
notes:
Volume of stemwood with bark of all trees and shrubs  starting at 12 cm dbh that were used, died or disappeared between two inventories.  *In the calculation no D7/tree height data were used. The values calculated like this have not been corrected for bias, but allow for cantons or forest districts a more robust estimation of changes and could thus be better interpreted. 

__Citation:__
 > _Abegg, M.; Brändli, U.-B.; Cioldi, F.; Fischer, C.; Herold-Bonardi, A.; Huber M.; Keller, M.; Meile, R.; Rösler, E.; Speich, S.; Traub, B.; Vidondo, B. (2014).
